cndi-config.$comment: The root of the cndi config schema
cndi-config.description: An object used to configure the changelog generation for GitHub Releases

infrastructure.description: An object which defines the infrastructure resources CNDI should deploy.

cndi.description: An object which contains the resources CNDI should deploy, which are defined by the CNDI project.

items.description: An object which defines the properties of a new Kubernetes node for CNDI to deploy.

name.description: The name of the node to deploy.

kind.description: The type of node to deploy.

cluster_manifests.description: An object that maps labels to categories in the changelog.
